罧字的基本解释

罧
shēn
把柴堆在水里以捕鱼：“罧者扣舟。”

罧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèn］
［《廣韻》斯甚切，上寢，生。］
［《廣韻》所禁切，去沁，生。］
积柴于水中以取鱼。先以大树枝连叶下于水中，渔者乘船敲舷驱鱼入枝叶中，然后以竹帘围之，去掉树枝，即得鱼。

罧字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罧； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页948第05
【廣韻】所今切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】疏簪切，?音森。【說文】積柴水中，聚魚也。　又【廣韻】同槮。【爾雅·釋器】槮謂之涔。【註】今之作槮者，積柴木于水中，魚得寒，入其里藏隱，因以薄圍捕取之。【疏】槮罧，古今字。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?所禁切，音滲。義同。　又【廣韻】斯甚切【集韻】斯荏切，?音沁。義同。　又【集韻】犁針切，音林。義同。

罧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
罧字的起名意思

暂无。

罧
Basic explanation of words
罧
shēn
Pile the firewood in the water to catch the fish: "The warrior buckles the boat."
罧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèn］
["Guangyun" Si Shiqie, go to bed, give birth. ]
[Forbidden to cut in "Guangyun", go to Qin, and give birth. ]
Accumulate wood in the water to fetch fish. First, the big branches and leaves are dropped into the water, and the fishermen ride the boat to drive the fish into the branches and leaves, and then surround them with bamboo curtains to remove the branches and get the fish.
罧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not Centralized] [Web Character Department] 　罧; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 948 05
[Guang Yun] So Jin cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] sparse hairpin cut,? Yin Sen. [Said the text] Accumulating firewood in the water, gathering fish.　[Guangyun] The same thing. 【Erya·Release Device】槮 is called 涔. [Note] Today's people who are making fire, build wood and wood in the water, the fish gets cold, and they hide in it, because they are trapped with thinness. 【Sparse】槮罧, ancient and modern characters.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Prohibited cutting, sound infiltration. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Si Shiqie [Ji Yun] Si Luqie,? Yinqin. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Plowing needle cutting, Yinlin. The same meaning.
